Canvas for Through France With the 79th Infantry Division

body.value: Description of the Normandy Landing and campaign. Drawing of Fort du Roule (Cherbourg).  Image of soldiers and ships coming ashore.  Image of a ruined Norman town

Description of the crossing of the Seine.  Text in red; "At 2130 on the darkest, rainiest Aug 19 on record the division received orders to cross the Seine.  By 0300 the 313th had one battalion across - the first Allied troops over the Seine.  The Luftwaffe came in swarms but the 463 AAA bn made the homeward flight a lonely ride.  The division artillery's murderous fire made a continuous pattern of death."  Drawing of soldiers advancing in darkness.
Unit crest of the 79th Infantry Division (Cross of Lorraine).  Hand written "map no. 1"
